sentences.en: A consultation paper has been posted on the Internet inviting input from Net users.
sentences.cn: 一份征询意见书已贴在了因特网上，欢迎网络用户发表意见。

sentences.en: Certainly, Andreessen didn't think up using hypertext to link Internet documents.
sentences.cn: 当然,用超文本链接因特网文档并不是安德烈亚森发明的.

sentences.en: Clients are not charged by the minute but given unmetered access to the Internet for a fixed fee.
sentences.cn: 客户使用因特网不是按分钟计费的，而是交固定的费用后便可以随意使用。

sentences.en: Do you have access to the Internet?
I surf the Internet two hours a day.
sentences.cn: 我每天上网冲浪两个小时.

sentences.en: If you're interested in a subject, use the Internet to delve deeper.
sentences.cn: 如果对某一主题感兴趣，就上网进一步深入研究。

sentences.en: Internet addresses are also known as URLs.
Our small company has had 78,000 hits on its Internet pages.
sentences.cn: 我们这个小公司的因特网网页已经有了78,000次的点击量。

sentences.en: The Internet is the largest computer bulletin board in the world.
sentences.cn: 因特网是世界上最大的计算机公告系统。

sentences.en: There is counseling to help Internet addicts? even online .
sentences.cn: 有咨询机构帮助网络 沉迷 者.

sentences.en: They are part of a new addiction called Internet addiction.
sentences.cn: 他们是新兴网络爱好者中的一部分.

sentences.en: TI has seen its shares suffer because of a flight of capital from telecom and Internet-related businesses.
sentences.cn: 德州仪器的股票因为资金从电信和因特网相关企业外逃而遭受损失。

sentences.en: You can find it on the Internet.
sentences.cn: 你可以在因特网上找到它.

sentences.en: You can pay bills over the Internet. Additionally, you can check your balance or order statements.
sentences.cn: 可以在网上支付账单。此外，还能查对余额或订货结算单。

sentences.en: You can use a directory service to search for people on the Internet.
sentences.cn: 你可以利用因特网的目录服务搜索人名。

phrases.tran_cn: 因特网浏览器；微软网页浏览器
中国的因特网；网络在中国
互联网普及率；英特网的市场占有率
上网；上网冲浪；网上冲浪；浏览因特网
无线互联网；无线上网；无线网际网路

trans.tran_en: a computer system that allows millions of computer users around the world to exchange information
The Internet is the network that allows computer users to connect with computers all over the world, and that carries e-mail
